trans-unit.source: Add an integration to the Aspire project.
trans-unit.target: Add an integration to the Aspire project.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while adding the package: {0}
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while adding the package: {0}

trans-unit.source: The name of the integration to add (e.g. redis, postgres).
trans-unit.target: The name of the integration to add (e.g. redis, postgres).

trans-unit.source: No integration packages were found. Please check your internet connection or NuGet source configuration.
trans-unit.target: No integration packages were found. Please check your internet connection or NuGet source configuration.

trans-unit.note: {0} is the package name, {1} is the version.

trans-unit.source: The package installation failed with exit code {0}. For more information run with --debug switch.
trans-unit.target: The package installation failed with exit code {0}. For more information run with --debug switch.

trans-unit.source: The path to the project file to add the integration to.
trans-unit.target: The path to the project file to add the integration to.

trans-unit.source: The NuGet source to use for the integration.
trans-unit.target: The NuGet source to use for the integration.

trans-unit.source: The version of the integration to add.
trans-unit.target: The version of the integration to add.
